meta.title: Digg - What the Internet is talking about right now

div.a: Bowing To Pressure, NBC Will Stream Olympics Closing Ceremony Live Online

div.div: Olympic broadcaster NBC has bowed to pressure and agreed to stream the Games' closing ceremony live. In a change of plan, the network will air London's farewell to the quadrennial event in real time on its website.

div.a: One step at a time. TV in 2014/2016? MT@guardian: Bowing, NBC will stream #Olympics2012 closing live online … #NBCfail

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/RINQZG&via=Digg&text=Bowing To Pressure, NBC Will Stream Olympics Closing Ceremony Live Online

div.a: How India's Favorite TV Show Uses Data To Change The World

div.div: Unlike so many popular programs, Satyamev Jayate doesn’t involve a singing competition or a collection of volatile strangers living under the same roof. It’s a documentary program tackling some of the country’s most-sensitive topics.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/PMJDhf&via=Digg&text=How India's Favorite TV Show Uses Data To Change The World

div.a: FBI Believed Kim Dotcom Had A 'Doomsday Device'

div.div: The FBI actually believed Dotcom had a Dr. Strangelove-style “doomsday device” that was capable of wiping out all evidence of Internet piracy with the flick of a switch.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/QYkrf9&via=Digg&text=FBI Believed Kim Dotcom Had A 'Doomsday Device'

div.div: POT CALLING THE KETTLE...YOU GET THE IDEA

div.a: 'Son Of Sam' Killer Decries Violence As 'Senseless'

div.div: 35 years to the day his reign of terror ended, David Berkowitz, the Son of Sam, speaks gently from his jail cell with the words: society needs to take the “glory out of guns.”

div.a: If you shoot 13 people and kill 6 of them, I don't think you get to be a moral compass as your dotage nears

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Tmzqgk&via=Digg&text='Son Of Sam' Killer Decries Violence As 'Senseless'

div.div: HAS NO OPINION ON PRONUNCIATION OF GIF

div.a: Romney's VP Is A Defense, Tech Policy N00b

div.div: Like the man at the top, Ryan is a fairly blank slate when it comes to national security, and his tech-policy record is a mixed one.

div.a: Paul Ryan: How The Conversation Took Off On Twitter

div.div: Conversation around Mitt Romney's selection of Paul Ryan for VP peaked at 3,749 tweets per minute.

div.a: The CIA-Connected Intelligence Firm Watching Americans

div.div: The latest WikiLeaks release has shone a spotlight on an alleged domestic and foreign surveillance program run with cloud-based software provided by Texas company TrapWire, many of whose top leaders and employees are former members of three-letter American intelligence agencies

div.a: How To Watch The Perseid Meteor Shower

div.div: If you watch one meteor shower all year, then catch the overnight Perseid shooting star display tonight.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/NUbETX&via=Digg&text=How To Watch The Perseid Meteor Shower

div.a: Mars Curiosity Getting A 'Brain Transplant' This Weekend

div.div: NASA's Mars rover Curiosity will begin a "brain transplant" today, a four-day operation that will bring a temporary halt to the robot's science activities.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/S87YQK&via=Digg&text=Mars Curiosity Getting A 'Brain Transplant' This Weekend

div.a: Earth Destroyed Repeatedly In The Name Of Science

div.div: The August 10 issue of the Astrophysical Journal reports that a team of scientists are working on destroying the world – not once, but repeatedly.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TlXb80&via=Digg&text=Earth Destroyed Repeatedly In The Name Of Science

div.a: How YouTube Will Escape Google's New Pirate Penalty

div.div: Google has announced that it will soon penalize sites that are repeatedly accused of copyright infringement. But one site in particular doesn’t need to worry: Google’s own YouTube. It has a unique immunity against the forthcoming penalty.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/NSGGve&via=Digg&text=How YouTube Will Escape Google's New Pirate Penalty

div.a: How A Guy With A Wooden Leg Won 6 Olympic Medals

div.div: In 1904, a man with a wooden leg won 6 Olympic medals. His story starts with Napoleon.

div.a: A Beginner's Guide To Shark Week

div.div: Thrashing limbs, bloodied ocean and the shell-crushing teeth of the most-feared creature in the sea: this my friends, is Shark Week.

Oops: Romney Introduces VP Pick As 'The Next President Of The United States'

div.div: Mitt Romney accidentally introduced Paul Ryan as “the next president of the United States, Paul Ryan!” at his introduction rally on Saturday.

div.a: Romney introduces Ryan as "next prez", then with his arm around Ryan's shoulder, says he sometimes makes mistakes
